item.title: Hockey: Imperial Men’s draw with Guy’s King’s
item.author: Ewan Quince,
item.description: The day after the bottle match and at 9:30, Captain yogi was down to 7 players with 4 injuries from the day before. Calling in all the favours, IC managed to scratch 10 together to line up against GKT in the ULU Prem. Division – which IC 1sts can neither win nor lose at this stage in the season. …
